item.title: Mastering MLOps: 8 Principles to deliver Reliable Machine Learning
item.description: Take your machine learning from zero to hero with 8 essential MLOps principles—boost efficiency, ensure reliability, and build AI systems that are scalable, ethical, and impactful

item.title: Accelerating AI/ML Value: Transforming Investment to Impact
item.description: Explore how to derive business impact, competitive advantage, and enhanced decision-making from AI/ML, and learn how to tackle the common challenges in achieving rapid time-to-value.

item.title: What's so modern about the modern data stack?
item.description: See how much more the modern data stack can do for your organisation when employed the right way.

item.title: 5 Steps to Frictionless AI
item.description: Let’s finally make AI do the work for us instead of fighting with it.

item.title: What the Ops are you talking about?
item.description: How to choose between DataOps vs MLOps vs AIOps - what are the right Ops for your big data team?

item.title: Launching Into Uncertainty - 6 Smart Steps to Future-Proof Your ML Models
item.description: Your machine learning model is going to fail in the pandemic. Here’s how to mitigate the damage.
